texts: Create your personalized portfolio website in just a few easy steps.
Choose a template, enter your information, and download your website.
Select from a variety of professional templates.
Preview each template to find the one that best suits your style.

teamMembers.name: Lucas Martins Sorge
teamMembers.bio: Hello, my name is Lucas, and I am a Computer Science and Data Science student at Iowa State University. Throughout my studies and work experience, I have gained strong technical skills in web development, including front-end and back-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Python, and NodeJS.

teamMembers.name: Lucas Nerone Rillo
teamMembers.bio: Hi, I am Lucas, a Computer Sciuence and Math student at Iowa State University. Through my experience on full-stack development, I learned jQuery, Angular, and React for the frontend, as well as Spring Boot and Django for the backend.
